message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $9,500.  I think this is a fair price considering its value to you.  Let me know your thoughts!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7,500. I believe that's a more reasonable price considering the value of the product to me.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $7,500 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit from my initial price, but I need to stay closer to $9,000 to make this worthwhile.  How about $8,750?  This would give us both a fair deal.
I understand your concerns, but $8,750 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $8,250. I think this is a fair compromise considering the value of the product to me.
